name: Green Octopus Hand Painted Ceramic Plate
description:
Are you a fan of the Cephalopod? Do wriggly eight legged sea creatures make you smile? Then this decorative hand painted ceramic plate is for you. Hand painted by me on an 8" vintage ceramic salad plate, this green octopus will add a nautical twist to your home decor. 

This 8" plate is signed and dated on the back. 

I used a permanent glaze on glaze painting technique that allowed me to upcycle vintage ceramics from an incomplete set I found. The paint is non toxic, but I would only use this plate for decorative purposes only as sharp utensils can damage the glaze. Hand wash only.

name: Peacock Feathers Black Ceramic Travel Mug
description:
Three lovely hand painted peacock feathers adorn this eco friendly black ceramic travel mug with flexible silicone lid. The feathers have lovely shades of green, turquoise, blues, and yellows. A sweet, stylish way to carry your favorite beverage around with you. 

Take this 11 oz. double wall insulated eco coffee cup with you to fill it up with a hot or cold beverage. You'll have original style and be doing your part in reducing landfill waste. The double wall insulated ceramic means that your drink will stay hot, but not the outside of the mug so it's comfortable to carry around without a coffee cozi. 

Each mug is hand painted by me, so no two mugs will be exactly alike. 

5.75" Tall x 2.25" Base x 3.5" Rim

The paint used in this design is heat set for durability and non-toxic. I recommend hand washing with non-abrasive materials to preserve the color vibrancy. Mugs are micowave safe without the lid on. Paint contains no toxic ingredients and conforms to ASTM D-4236

*****READY TO SHIP! I ship mugs USPS Priority mail domestically. I also ship internationally.

name: Ceramic Bird Planter
description:
This day of the dead bird has been designed with black and white glazes over ceramic bisque. A ceramic planter that brings modern folk art and function into your home. 

5" long by 3" wide by 3.5" to the top of the bird's head
The opening is 2" x 2" but expands bigger inside the bird's body

Hand painted by me with permanent heat set glazes. The planter washes clean by hand, and dries easily, ready for use. The bird planter does not come with a plant.
